name: Chick Bubbles
description:
This is my second game, after using Unity for 2 weeks wooo! 

This is my submission for the Startup Cities Game Jam

This is my take on a 2D platformer, my inspiration came from a game called Lemmings. 

Your in charge of getting the chickens to safety! Block holes, make a path by blowing bubbles (don't worry, these bubbles don't pop!), give your chickens a hand in jumping over the obstacles or something blocking their way.  

Rescue as many chickens as you can to earn stars! 

Have fun :)

Art by: Pixel Frog - Unity Asset Store - Accessed via Unity Asset Store on 20/11/2020 - Extension Asset - Free to use.

Music by: joshuaempyre - Arcade Music Loop - Accessed via FreeSound.org on 22/11/2020 - Creative Commons.
